tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My daughter (Shaguftaa imraan)was in critical condition when we brought her to sagar hospital.. her heart rate was too high and luckily she was treated by Dr Raghunath sir.. she got the utmost care which she needed in her critical times and we are very happy with the treatment she got and also the Dr is very friendly and listens peacefully.. we highly recommended Dr. Raghunath to our friends and family members
